Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ToolCardBehaviour
    This interface represents the behavior of a tool card.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardDealer
    This Class is used in the game's setup to deal the cards of each type in the right way according to the game's rules.
    Controller
    Base abstract class for game controllers.
    ControllerTest  
    CopperFoilBurnisherBehaviour
    Represents the 'CopperFoilBurnisher' ToolCard.
    CopperFoilBurnisherBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for CopperFoilBurnisherBehaviour class.
    CorkBackedStraightedgeBehaviour
    Represents the "Cork-backed Straightedge" tool card.
    CorkBackedStraightedgeBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for CorkBackedStraightedgeBehaviour class.
    EglomiseBrushBehaviour
    Represents the 'EglomiseBrush' ToolCard.
    EglomiseBrushBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for EglomiseBrushBehaviour class.
    FluxBrushBehaviour
    Represents the "Flux Brush" tool card.
    FluxBrushBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for FluxBrushBehaviour class.
    FluxRemoverBehaviour
    The class to describe the behaviour of the Flux Remover ToolCard ToolCard.
    FluxRemoverBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for FluxRemoverBehaviour class.
    GlazingHammerBehaviour
    Represents the "Glazing Hammer" tool card.
    GlazingHammerBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for GlazinHammerBehaviour class.
    GrindingStoneBehaviour
    The class to describe the behaviour of the Grinding Stone ToolCard ToolCard.
    GrindingStoneBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for GrindingStoneBehaviour class.
    GrozingPliersBehaviour
    Represents the 'GrozingPliers' ToolCard.
    GrozingPliersBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for GrozingPliersBehaviour class.
    LathekinBehaviour
    Represents the 'CopperFoilBurnisher' ToolCard.
    LathekinBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for LathekinBehaviour class.
    LensCutterBehaviour
    The class to describe the behaviour of the Lens Cutter ToolCard ToolCard.
    LensCutterBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for LensCutterBehaviour class.
    MatchMaker
    Singleton used to link a view to a controller.
    MultiPlayerController
    The controller for the MultiPlayer configuration.
    MultiPlayerControllerTest  
    RunningPliersBehaviour
    The class to describe the behaviour of the Running Pliers ToolCard ToolCard.
    RunningPliersBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for RunningPliersBehaviour class.
    SinglePlayerController
    This class extends the abstract Controller class and implements those behaviors that are different in Single Player and MultiPlayer mode: the main differences are in the management of the connection/reconnection of the Player, in the game's setting up, in the ToolCard's usage and in the end game scoring.
    TapWheelBehaviour
    Represents the "Tap Wheel" tool card.
    TapWheelBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for TapWheelBehaviour class.
    TestSinglePlayerController
    Class to test the class SinglePlayerController in the package 'controller'.
